title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Mix eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Combine pasta with pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Prepare sauce with tomato, cream, and spices.
Add chicken to sauce and simmer.
